film_tiktok_outside.title: The TikTok that Broke the Internet
text: You go live. You’re slumped outside the ER, IV still dangling, and Zayka jumps into frame like a little demon with purpose.
Bandit handles the camera, his raspy meow providing gritty narration. You talk about what happened. You barely cry. You mostly laugh.
It takes off in minutes. People are outraged, amused, horrified, and obsessed with your cats.
You get a DM from a reporter. Another from a Spoonie merch store. Your follower count explodes. Your cats are planning a press tour.

choices.text: 🧑‍💻 Accept the interview and become a voice for change
